channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Two large trees with lots of dead branches that regularly fall into my garden, 21st September
item.description:
I hope that severe pruning will save these two trees but I usually find a large branch in my garden at least every week and, after high winds, more than one branch.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdowne Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped furniture, 21st September
item.description:

item.title: Bags of rubbish dumped by the Green Cabinet on Halt Robin Road Belvedere DA17 near the junction with Picardy Road Belvedere DA17, 21st September
item.description:
Several bags of rubbish have been dumped by the Green (Virgin Media) Cabinet on Halt Robin Road Belvedere DA17, approximately 10 metres from the junction with Picardy Road Belvedere DA17. Would arrangements be put in place to remove the rubbish as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Halt Robin Road, Lower Belvedere, London
